children.name: Combat Reflexes
children.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

modifiers.name: Directional
modifiers.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

modifiers.name: Tough Skin
modifiers.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

modifiers.name: Know Your Own Strength Variant Price

children.name: Signature Gear
children.notes: For equipment normally bought with money, each point gives goods worth up to 50% of the average campaign starting wealth (but never cash).

modifiers.name: Collectors - Whatever we need to perform our duty

children.name: Obsession
children.notes: Figure out why the world is so fucked up and fix it

children.name: No Sex Drive
children.notes: +2 bonus to resist seduction attempts; -2 reaction penalty from those who are trying to flirt, entice, or possibly even get your attention as well as those, at least those who also lack this Quirk, who witness any said attempts.

children.name: Area Knowledge
children.notes: Location of its major cities and important sites; awareness of its major customs, ethnic groups, and languages (but not necessarily expertise); names of folk of Status 6+; and a general understanding of the economic and political situation
+1 Acc for aimed shots. Iron, not fragile glass.
1 turn to ready, Free action to sling.
20 lb small items. Ready/Fast-Draw. +1 to Fast-Draw.

other_equipment.notes: 40 lb. Drop as Free Action. Fragile items break on 1 on 1d.

children.notes: Minimum gear for camping: -2 to any Survival roll without it. Includes utensils, tinderbox or flint and steel, towel, etc., as TL permits.

notes.text:
"From the heights of these pyramids, forty centuries look down on us."
Theme song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rTdCZK2e3o0
Hates his family and being told what to do and wants to be free of their influence so that he can live for himself; to this end he desires to discover the secrets of the fucked-up world he was born into so he can escape from this predicament. He left his home haven at an early age to work for a different one, where he worked as a tactician and archaeologist and proved to be a prodigy in the ways of a strange new class of weapon known as firearms. Now he's stuck back home, and he's pissed.
